name: node-mde
description: Biblioteca para consultar notas destinadas e enviar evento de manifestação do destinatário

scripts.build: pnpm run script && pnpm run types
scripts.vexta:
pnpm build & rd /s /q C:\Microcel\APIeApp\api-dfe
ode_modules
ode-mde\dist & rd /s /q C:\Microcel\APIeApp\api-dfe
ode_modules
ode-mde\lib & mkdir C:\Microcel\APIeApp\api-dfe
ode_modules
ode-mde\dist  & mkdir C:\Microcel\APIeApp\api-dfe
ode_modules
ode-mde\lib & xcopy dist C:\Microcel\APIeApp\api-dfe
ode_modules
ode-mde\dist /S /Y & xcopy lib C:\Microcel\APIeApp\api-dfe
ode_modules
ode-mde\lib /S /Y

author: Lucas Melo <lucashpmelo94@gmail.com>
